sampleDescriptions: Middle Market IPO Underwriting Cost Act, (HR 6324)  requires the SEC in consultation with FINRA to study the impacts on fees associated with the IPO process involving small and mid-cap companies within a year of enactment.   Incorporated in  HR2155.
